title: U.S. Christmas lights energy costs
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Energy cost in U.S. dollars for 3 number of Lighting Types.

The maximum Energy cost in U.S. dollars 27.21 is found at Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) and the minimum is found at LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each) where Energy cost in U.S. dollars is 0.06.
The difference of Energy cost in U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Lighting Type is 27.15.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Energy cost in U.S. dollars for 3 number of Lighting Types.

The Energy cost in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) and lowest at Lighting Type LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each).

The maximum Energy cost in U.S. dollars 27.21 is found at Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) and the minimum is found at LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each) where Energy cost in U.S. dollars is 0.06.

max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Lighting Type, and Energy cost in U.S. dollars in each Lighting Type on the y axis.

The Energy cost in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) and lowest at Lighting Type LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each).
The difference of Energy cost in U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Lighting Type is 27.15.
The Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) tends to be 2.42 percent higher than average.

data.Lighting Type: Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each)
